entries.npc_3_1: Well, certainly there are other artifacts.  Too bad, this one was really good...
entries.npc_2_1: I thought so.  You look like a good man.  I'll make it worth your while.
entries.npc_1_1: There's an assassin on this planet who's been killing all the top scientists in the area.  I want him eliminated and I'm willing to pay well for it.  Can you do it?
entries.player_2_1: I don't care about scientists.  Forget it.
entries.npc_reward_1: Here you go, these bugs are very rare, and could be worth a lot if you can find a buyer.
entries.npc_4_1: No one knows.  He seems to have some sort of problem with the work that we do, but we don't know why.
entries.npc_4_2: It's a highly classified agent that we were using to destroy poisonous plants, but he's modified it to kill all vegetable matter.
entries.not_it: No, sorry, that's not the item I was looking for...
entries.npc_reward_2: Here you go.  I found this nice picture of the creature I was studying.  It's really all I have to give you though.
entries.player_2_2: Oh, my, I couldn't care less about you and your problem.
entries.player_1_2: I'll stop this guy before he gets started.
entries.npc_3_2: Great.  I'm wasting my time with you then.  Do you know anyone who DOES work?
entries.npc_2_2: Thanks.  I really appreciate it.  I'll find something to give you when you return.
entries.npc_1_2: One of our assistants has gone mad and is planning on releasing a toxin into the air that would kill all the plantlife on this planet.  He must be stopped.  I can tell you where he is if you can stop him.
entries.cantwork: I understand you're already working for someone else.  Come back when you're done with that job.
entries.gotowork: I need you to finish that task I gave you earlier.  Ok?
